Interface Worker

All Known Implementing Classes:
DebugThreadWorker, ProcessWorker
interface Worker

A worker.

Author:
Philip Aston

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Destroy the worker.
 OutputStream getCommunicationStream()
          Return an output stream connected to the input stream for the worker.

          Return the worker name.

          Wait until the worker has completed.
